verses.verse: And you were dead <S%G3498><s%> in your trespasses <S%G3900><s%> and sins, <S%G266><s%>

in which <S%G3739><s%> you formerly <S%G4218><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the course <S%G165><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the prince <S%G758><s%> of the power <S%G1849><s%> of the air, <S%G109><s%> of the spirit <S%G4151><s%> that is now <S%G3568><s%> working <S%G1754><s%> in the sons <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience. <S%G543><s%>

Among <S%G1722><s%> them we too <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> formerly <S%G4218><s%> lived <S%G390><s%> in the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of our flesh, <S%G4561><s%> indulging <S%G4160><s%> the desires <S%G2307><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> and of the mind, <S%G1271><s%> and were by nature <S%G5449><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of wrath, <S%G3709><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as the rest. <S%G3062><s%>

But God, <S%G2316><s%> being <S%G1510><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> in mercy, <S%G1656><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of His great <S%G4183><s%> love <S%G26><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> He loved <S%G25><s%> us,

even <S%G2532><s%> when we were dead <S%G3498><s%> in our transgressions, <S%G3900><s%> made <S%G4806><s%> us alive <S%G4806><s%> together <S%G4806><s%> with Christ <S%G5547><s%> (by grace <S%G5485><s%> you have been <S%G1510><s%> saved <S%G4982><s%>),
and raised <S%G4891><s%> us up with Him, and seated <S%G4776><s%> us with Him in the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> [places], in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

in order <S%G2443><s%> that in the ages <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G1904><s%> He might show <S%G1731><s%> the surpassing <S%G5235><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of His grace <S%G5485><s%> in kindness <S%G5544><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> us in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
For by grace <S%G5485><s%> you have been saved <S%G4982><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%> and that not of yourselves, <S%G4771><s%> [it is] the gift <S%G1435><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>
not as a result <S%G1537><s%> of works, <S%G2041><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> should boast. <S%G2744><s%>

For we are His workmanship, <S%G4161><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> for good <S%G18><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> prepared <S%G4282><s%> beforehand, <S%G4282><s%> that we should walk <S%G4043><s%> in them.

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> remember, <S%G3421><s%> that formerly <S%G4218><s%> you, the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> who are called <S%G3004><s%> "Uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>" by the so-called "Circumcision, <S%G4061><s%>" [which is] performed <S%G5499><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> by human <S%G5499><s%> hands <S%G5499><s%> â€“

[remember] that you were at that time <S%G2540><s%> separate <S%G5565><s%> from Christ, <S%G5547><s%> excluded <S%G526><s%> from the commonwealth <S%G4174><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and strangers <S%G3581><s%> to the covenants <S%G1242><s%> of promise, <S%G1860><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> and without <S%G112><s%> God <S%G112><s%> in the world. <S%G2889><s%>

But now <S%G3570><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> you who <S%G3739><s%> formerly <S%G4218><s%> were far <S%G3112><s%> off <S%G3112><s%> have been <S%G1096><s%> brought <S%G1096><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> by the blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For He Himself <S%G846><s%> is our peace, <S%G1515><s%> who made <S%G4160><s%> both <S%G297><s%> [groups into] one, <S%G1520><s%> and broke <S%G3089><s%> down <S%G3089><s%> the barrier <S%G5418><s%> of the dividing <S%G3320><s%> wall, <S%G3320><s%>

by abolishing <S%G2673><s%> in His flesh <S%G4561><s%> the enmity, <S%G2189><s%> [which is] the Law <S%G3551><s%> of commandments <S%G1785><s%> [contained] in ordinances, <S%G1378><s%> that in Himself <S%G846><s%> He might make <S%G2936><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> into one <S%G1520><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> [thus] establishing <S%G4160><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%>

and might reconcile <S%G604><s%> them both <S%G297><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the cross, <S%G4716><s%> by it having put <S%G615><s%> to death <S%G615><s%> the enmity. <S%G2189><s%>

And He came <S%G2064><s%> and preached <S%G2097><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> to you who <S%G3588><s%> were far <S%G3112><s%> away, <S%G3112><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who were near; <S%G1451><s%>
for through <S%G1223><s%> Him we both <S%G297><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> our access <S%G4318><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> to the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> you are no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> strangers <S%G3581><s%> and aliens, <S%G3941><s%> but you are fellow <S%G4847><s%> citizens <S%G4847><s%> with the saints, <S%G40><s%> and are of God's household, <S%G3609><s%>

having been built <S%G2026><s%> upon the foundation <S%G2310><s%> of the apostles <S%G652><s%> and prophets, <S%G4396><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> being <S%G1510><s%> the corner <S%G204><s%> [stone],

in whom <S%G3739><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> building, <S%G3619><s%> being fitted <S%G4883><s%> together <S%G4883><s%> is growing <S%G837><s%> into a holy <S%G40><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> in the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>
in whom <S%G3739><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> are being built <S%G4925><s%> together <S%G4925><s%> into a dwelling <S%G2732><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
